item.title: 中国比亚迪称 5000 辆新能源汽车启航欧洲
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪周三表示，第三艘运载近5000辆新能源汽车前往欧洲的滚装船已经起航。【原文：Chinese carmaker BYD said on Wednesday that a third roll-on/roll-off ship carrying close to 5,000 new energy vehicles bound for Europe has set sail.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下滑，美元受美国利率前景支撑
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市走低，美元走强使日元维持在六个月低点附近，因为交易员们认为，在数据显示美国经济和劳动力市场保持稳定之后，美联储可能会缓慢降息。【原文：Asian stocks drifted lower on Wednesday, with a robust dollar keeping the yen pinned near six-month lows as traders wagered the Federal Reserve will likely be slow in cutting rates after data showed the U.S. economy and labour market remained stable.】

item.title: 轮胎制造商固特异将以 7.01 亿美元向住友橡胶出售邓禄普品牌
item.description: 固特异轮胎橡胶公司（Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co）周二表示，将以 7.01 亿美元现金向住友橡胶工业出售旗下邓禄普品牌。【原文：Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co said on Tuesday that it will sell its Dunlop brand to Sumitomo Rubber Industries for $701 million in cash.】

item.title: 澳大利亚核心通胀放缓，为 2 月降息敞开大门
item.description: 由于电费上涨，澳大利亚 11 月份的消费价格通胀率从三年来的低点回升，但核心通胀率的下降仍然为最早于下个月降息提供了支持。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation crept up from three-year lows in November as electricity costs jumped, but a drop in core inflation still bolstered the case for a cut in interest rates as early as next month.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）供应收紧、美国就业数据刺激油价上涨
item.description: 由于俄罗斯和石油输出国组织（OPEC）成员国的供应收紧，油价周三上涨，而显示美国职位空缺意外增加的数据表明，经济活动正在扩大，石油需求也随之增长。【原文：Oil prices rose on Wednesday as supplies from Russia and OPEC members tightened, while data showing an unexpected increase in U.S. jobs openings pointed to expanding economic activity and consequent growth in oil demand.】

item.title: 粉红狐狸 "丽娜贝尔 "赢得中国人的心，迪士尼利用情感经济
item.description: 每周，只要她从市场营销工作中抽出时间，就会发现 Ida Jia 在上海迪士尼乐园排上几个小时的队，只为和一只毛茸茸的粉色狐狸 Linabell（一只有着蓝色大眼睛的狐狸）待上几分钟。【原文：Each week, whenever she has time off from her marketing job, Ida Jia can be found at Shanghai Disneyland queuing for hours to spend a few minutes with Linabell, a fluffy pink fox with big blue eyes.】

item.title: 美国数据强劲，美元跟随收益率走高
item.description: 周三，在强劲的美国数据推动收益率飙升并减少了一些对美联储降息的押注之后，美元站稳了脚跟，日元则下挫至接近去年吸引干预的水平。【原文：The dollar stood tall on Wednesday and the yen sagged close to levels that drew intervention last year after strong U.S. data drove a spike in yields and pared some bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人报》报道：澳大利亚 CBA 未就现金存取费问题通知监管机构
item.description: 据《澳大利亚人报》报道，澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank Australia）在将一百万客户转移到新的银行账户之前，没有正式通知该国的任何一家审慎监管机构，导致许多客户不得不通过分行支付现金。【原文：The Commonwealth Bank of Australia failed to formally notify either of the country's prudential regulators before shifting a million customers to new bank accounts, causing many to pay to access cash through branches, the Australian reported.】

item.title: 独家报道比亚迪用违规签证将数百名中国工人带到巴西--调查员
item.description: 一位重要的劳动监察员周二告诉路透社记者，电动汽车生产商比亚迪用非正规签证招来了数百名中国工人在巴西建厂。【原文：Electric vehicle producer BYD brought hundreds of Chinese workers on irregular visas to build a factory in Brazil, a key labor inspector told Reuters on Tuesday, adding the company has pledged to comply with local labor laws for the workers remaining in the country.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯将向英国工厂投资 3.76 亿美元，重点生产定制汽车
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商劳斯莱斯（Rolls-Royce）周三表示，将投资 3 亿英镑（3.76 亿美元）扩建古德伍德工厂，以更专注于为高端客户定制汽车，包括黄金雕塑和珍珠母艺术品等。【原文：British luxury automaker Rolls-Royce said on Wednesday it will invest 300 million pounds ($376 million) to expand its Goodwood plant to focus more on bespoke cars for high-end clients, featuring anything from gold sculptures to mother-of-pearl artwork.】

item.title: Moviepass 母公司前首席执行官承认犯有证券欺诈和共谋罪
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，电影票订购服务公司 Moviepass 母公司的前负责人已承认犯有证券欺诈和共谋罪。【原文：The former head of movie ticket-subscription service Moviepass' parent company has pleaded guilty to charges of securities fraud and conspiracy, the U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 三星第四季度营业利润展望大幅低于预期
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周三预计，第四季度营业利润同比增长 131%，但由于在向 Nvidia（英伟达™）供应高端芯片方面落后于竞争对手 SK 海力士（SK Hynix），因此未能达到分析师的预期。【原文：Samsung Electronics estimated on Wednesday a 131% jump in fourth-quarter operating profit from a year earlier but missed analyst estimates by a large margin as it lagged behind rival SK Hynix in supplying high-end chips to Nvidia .】

item.title: 随着 NFL 赌徒的连胜，Flutter 削减了美国指导价
item.description: 全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter 周二表示，在美式橄榄球赌客享受了前所未有的连胜之后，预计其快速增长的美国 FanDuel 品牌 2024 年的盈利将大幅下降。【原文：Flutter , the world's largest online betting company, said on Tuesday it expects 2024 earnings at its fast-growing U.S. FanDuel brand to be sharply lower after American football gamblers enjoyed an unprecedented winning streak.】

item.title: CES 本田高管在特朗普上任前对新电动车生产持谨慎态度
item.description: 本田汽车公司的一位高级管理人员周二表示，由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的工业政策存在不确定性，本田汽车公司将对开始生产新型电动汽车持谨慎态度。【原文：Honda Motor will be cautious about starting production of new electric vehicles due to uncertainty about President-elect Donald Trump's industrial policy, a senior executive of the Japanese automaker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 由 Third Rock 支持的 Maze Therapeutics 在提交的美国 IPO 文件中披露盈利情况
item.description: 由Third Rock Ventures支持的生物技术公司Maze Therapeutics在周二提交的美国首次公开募股（IPO）文件中透露，该公司将在2024年前九个月实现盈利。【原文：Biotech firm Maze Therapeutics, backed by Third Rock Ventures, revealed a profit for the first nine months of 2024 in its paperwork for a U.S. initial public offering (IPO) filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华盛顿对中国 CATL 的标签会如何影响特斯拉？
item.description: 华盛顿将 CATL 列入与中国军方合作的公司名单，这可能会让特斯拉创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）陷入困境，对他如何平衡在特朗普政府中的角色和与中国的关系提出了挑战。【原文：Washington's addition of CATL to a list of firms it says work with China's military could put Tesla founder Elon Musk in a tight spot, challenging how he balances his role in the Trump administration with his ties to China.】

item.title: 联网设备现在可以贴上安全等级标签
item.description: 白宫周二公布了智能恒温器、婴儿监视器、应用程序控制的电灯和其他互联网连接设备的新标签，消费者可以通过标签了解这些日益流行的设备在网络安全标准方面的评分情况。【原文：The White House on Tuesday unveiled a new label for smart thermostats, baby monitors, app-controlled lights and other internet-connected devices that will allow consumers to see how the increasingly popular items rate on cybersafety criteria.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第四季度交付 75 架飞机
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）在周二提交的一份证券文件中说，去年第四季度交付了 75 架飞机，与 2023 年同期的交付量相近。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer delivered 75 aircraft in last year's fourth quarter, similar to the same period in 2023, the company said in a securities filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚预计第四季度上游盈利将有所缓解
item.description: 埃克森美孚周二表示，油价的变化将使其第四季度上游盈利减少 5 亿至 9 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday changes in oil prices would ease its fourth-quarter upstream earnings by $500 million to $900 million.】

item.title: 亚洲 收益率飙升刺破风险偏好，日本对日元发出警告
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 亚马逊称 AWS 计划在格鲁吉亚投资至少 110 亿美元建设人工智能基础设施
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周二表示，亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）计划投资约 110 亿美元，扩建其在格鲁吉亚的基础设施，以支持云计算和人工智能技术。【原文：Amazon.com said on Tuesday Amazon Web Services (AWS) plans to invest about $11 billion to expand its infrastructure in Georgia to support cloud computing and AI technologies.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称公司计划与联发科合作设计台式机芯片
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋周二表示，联发科将可以出售两家公司本周早些时候发布的桌面中央处理器芯片，Nvidia 对该芯片的未来计划尚未披露。【原文：Nvidia Chief Executive Jensen Huang said on Tuesday that MediaTek will be able to sell the desktop central processor chip the two companies unveiled earlier this week and that Nvidia has undisclosed future plans for the chip.】

item.title: 美国向爱沙尼亚移交 5000 万美元罚没资产以协助起诉丹斯克银行
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，为表彰爱沙尼亚在成功起诉丹斯克银行及相关没收行动中提供的协助，美国司法部与爱沙尼亚达成了一项协议，双方将共享 5000 万美元的没收资产。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday it entered an agreement to share $50 million in forfeited assets with Estonia in recognition of Estonia's assistance in the successful prosecution of Danske Bank and related forfeiture.】

item.title: 科技团体敦促美国停止限制全球使用人工智能芯片的规定
item.description: 一个科技行业组织周二敦促乔-拜登总统的政府不要在最后一刻发布一项将控制全球人工智能芯片使用权的规定，并警告说这种限制将危及美国在人工智能领域的领导地位。【原文：A technology industry group on Tuesday urged President Joe Biden's administration to refrain from issuing a last-minute rule that would control global access to AI chips, warning the restrictions would jeopardize U.S. leadership in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国起诉高纬环球及其他业主涉嫌协调租金价格
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，Cushman & Wakefield 是被美国司法部起诉的六家大房东之一，被指控在房屋租赁市场存在反竞争行为。【原文：Cushman & Wakefield was among six large landlords sued by the U.S. Department of Justice over alleged anticompetitive practices in housing rental markets, the DOJ said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Itau BBA 称亚马逊、MercadoLibre 将从墨西哥进口关税中受益
item.description: Itau BBA 的分析师称，电子商务巨头亚马逊和 MercadoLibre 将从墨西哥对低成本进口商品征收的新关税中获益，超过 Shein 和 Temu 等亚洲零售商。【原文：E-commerce giants Amazon.com and MercadoLibre stand to benefit from new tariffs on low-cost imports into Mexico over Asian retailers like Shein and Temu, according to analysts at Itau BBA.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，Anthropic 拟融资 20 亿美元，人工智能初创公司估值达 600 亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 正在进行融资 20 亿美元的谈判，这笔交易将使 OpenAI 的竞争对手估值达到 600 亿美元。【原文：AI startup Anthropic is in advanced talks to raise $2 billion in a deal valuing the OpenAI rival at $60 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华盛顿邮报》将裁员 4% 以削减成本
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》周二表示，该报将裁员约 4%，即不到 100 名员工，以削减成本，这家历史悠久的报社正在努力应对日益严重的亏损。【原文：The Washington Post said on Tuesday it would lay off about 4% of its workforce or less than 100 employees in a bid to cut costs, as the storied newspaper grapples with growing losses.】

item.title: 特朗普希望延长美国债务上限，称不希望看到美国违约
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他希望美国国会延长国家债务上限，并补充说他不希望看到联邦政府出现债务违约，目前美国的债务高达 36 万亿美元。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he wants the U.S. Congress to extend the nation's debt ceiling, adding that he did not want to see the federal government default on its debt, which currently tops $36 trillion.】

item.title: Discovery+ 价格上涨一美元，流媒体服务今年首次涨价
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）的流媒体平台 "发现+"（Discovery+）周二表示，将把月订阅价格提高 1 美元，成为新年首个提高价格的流媒体服务。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's streaming platform Discovery+ is increasing its monthly subscription price by $1, the company said on Tuesday, becoming the first streaming service to raise rates in the new year.】
